content: My daughter is convinced she's a fairy. Yesterday she tried to jump off the balcony, thinking she would've been able to fly.
translations: ita:Mia figlia Ã¨ convinta di essere una fata. ieri ha provato a saltare dal balcone, pensando che avrebbe potuto volare
